description: This file is a Dart script designed to automate CI tasks for a Flutter project. It checks for the presence of pubspec.yaml, runs pub get, analyzes the project, and executes tests with CI environment variables set.

methods.description: Main asynchronous entry point that performs CI tasks for the Flutter project.

methods.description: Helper function to execute commands within the project directory and stream output.
